name: MasterHacker
description:
Masterhacker is an early prototype of a game in which you can hack into different computers. By hacking yourself through the levels, you'll be a  real masterhacker at the end of the game.

Pre-Alpha Release

Because it's an early prototype I called it the Pre-Alpha Release. So far, the game contains only one computer that you can hack as sort of a demo so you can see the potential of it.

Design you own levels

In the first level, you see a lot of elements that can be used to create larger and more complicate levels:

  • A circuit that can be activated or disactivated
  • A detection-system that activates the defend-bots
  • Defend bots that block you 
  • A gate that can be opened and closed
  • Files that need to be hacked to accomplish the level

With these elements, you are free to design your own levels and send them to me. I'll look at the designs and look what I can do whit them. 

Storyline

To make a link between the different computers and levels, I will also develop a story in which a hacker plays the leading role. It will be about a Russian hacke rin a cyberwar between Russia and the USA who both want the supreme powerand rule the world.

Software

All the music and sound effects are created in Cubase AI. The engine I use is the Godot Game Engine and the graphical design is done with Photoshop. The images I use come from pexels.com.

Disclaimer
